pre_caption: This is a street-level view of a corner in a Japanese town on a wet, overcast day. A landscaped traffic island with a tree and yellow flowers sits in the foreground. Across the street, a modern building for an "Exterior Garden" business is visible, along with other houses and abundant greenery. Cars can be seen driving along the wet road.
